meanings.definition: A type of tree with smooth bark and thin branches.
meanings.sent1: The birches in the forest swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I love the sound of wind rustling through the birches.
meanings.sent3: The birches whispered secrets to each other in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The birches stood tall like guardians of the woods.
meanings.sent5: The white bark of the birches gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The wood of a birch tree.
meanings.sent1: She carved a beautiful figurine out of birches.
meanings.sent2: The furniture was made of polished birches.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a stunning landscape on birches.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of fresh birches filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The delicate texture of birches made them perfect for crafting.

meanings.definition: To whip or beat with a birch rod.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used to birches to punish naughty students.
meanings.sent2: He birches the rug to remove the dust.
meanings.sent3: She playfully birches her brother in a pillow fight.
meanings.sent4: The wind birches the leaves off the trees in autumn.
meanings.sent5: The chef birches the eggs to create a fluffy omelette.
